name: Latish Destroyer
description:
Latish Destroyer is the game where you dynamically and fast destroy the corporation of one man - Latish.

You will meet multiple enemy types, which Latish's laboratories made especially to kill you, The Destroyer.

This game consist of 6 levels, where you have to complete the objective of it. Simply run through level destroying enemies and do some little activities.

This game was made for the joke purposes. This game is not intent to offend or harm anyone.
